Fire Elemental

Description

Fire Elementals are blazing creatures of living flame found in the Caves and City levels of Remixed Dungeon. They attack by striking with their fiery bodies and can set their targets ablaze. These enemies are particularly dangerous due to their burning attack and fire immunities.

Stats

  • HP/HT: 65
  • Defense Skill: 20
  • Attack Skill: 25
  • Damage: 16-20
  • Armor (DR): 5
  • EXP for Kill: 10
  • Maximum Level: 20
  • Speed: Normal
  • Type: Elemental, Flying

Immunities

  • Fire - Takes no damage from fire sources
  • Burning - Cannot be affected by burning status
  • Wand of Firebolt - Immune to this wand
  • Scroll of Psionic Blast - Immune to this scroll
  • Bleeding - Cannot bleed
  • carcass_drop - Does not drop food when killed

Special Abilities

  • Burning Attack: On successful hit, has a 50% chance to inflict Burning on the target
  • Burning Healing: When affected by Burning, will heal a random amount up to 4x their max HP (1-260 HP)
  • Frost Vulnerability: When affected by Frost, will take damage up to 2/3 of their max HP (1-43 damage)
  • Flying: Can fly over terrain obstacles

Location

Fire Elementals can typically be found in:

  • Caves (levels 13-14) - 0.02 chance on each level
  • City (levels 16-19) - Common enemy type on all city levels

Drops

  • Potion of Liquid Flame (10% chance)

Strategy

  • Use Wand of Frost or frost-based attacks for effective damage
  • Keep your distance and use ranged attacks when possible
  • Be prepared for their 50% chance to inflict burning on hit
  • Don't allow these enemies to surround you as multiple burning effects can be lethal
  • Frost-based attacks are especially effective against them due to vulnerability mechanic

Content Verification

  • Information source: Java class FireElemental.java
  • Stats verification: Extracted directly from FireElemental.java class properties
  • Special abilities: Based on implementation in FireElemental.java
  • Last updated: December 2025, source: Remixed Dungeon 1.9.3
